chunk:
Leaf Simple Daily Mild Cleasing Pad

Brand: Leaf Simple

Category: Makeup Remover

Ingredients: Water, Betaine, Polyglyceryl-6 Caprylate, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Glycerin, Bisabolol, Brasenia Schreberi Leaf Extract, Trehalose, Glycolipids, Coco-Glucoside, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract, Butylene Glycol, Propanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol,

Glycolipids, Coco-Glucoside, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract, Butylene Glycol, Propanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydroxyacetophenone.

Directions: Usage: Please use the textured surface to wipe-off the facial base makeup, then wipe-off the eye makeup, the last step is the cleasing with smooth surface. After removing makeup, no need for a second cleansing, can rinse with water.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
